In recent years, three such large-scale outbreaks were reported in the cities of Gujrat, 2 Sargodha 3 and Larkana 4 5 ( figure 1). Published reports on these outbreaks are sketchy about the origins and routes of transmission, mainly because accurate evidence-based information is missing.
